name: Pokémon Breeder
text: Put a Stage 2 Evolution card from your hand on the matching Basic Pokémon. You can only play this card when you would be allowed to evolve that Pokémon anyway.

effect.text: Put a Stage 2 Evolution card from your hand on the matching Basic Pokémon. You can only play this card when you would be allowed to evolve that Pokémon anyway.

strengths: Reduces deck space needed for Stage 1
weaknesses: Still requires waiting a turn to evolve
counters: Lass - Shuffles Breeder back into deck

competitiveHistory: Pokémon Breeder was essential for any deck running Stage 2 Pokemon, allowing them to skip the Stage 1 entirely for faster setup.

rulings.ruling: You can only use Pokemon Breeder when you could normally evolve (not on a Pokemon played this turn or your first turn).
The Stage 2 must match the evolution chain (e.g., Charizard on Charmander).
